short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When activated, this extension will let you control Ampache with your keyboard's media keys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use this extension, simply open your Ampache website in chrome. Once it's open, click the extension. After that, you can control the Ampache website with the Play/Pause, Next Track, and Previous Track keyboard buttons. 

You can turn off the media key controls by simply clicking the extension again.

One last note, this thing is much easier to use if you pin it.
